update survey_templates set company_id = #{companyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, stage = #{stage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, manager_only = #{managerOnly,jdbcType=BIT}, status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, created_by = #{createdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, created_at = #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updated_at = #{updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, version = #{version,jdbcType=INTEGER}, is_default = #{isDefault,jdbcType=BIT}, description = #{description,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}
where survey_template_id = #{surveyTemplateId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
select survey_template_id, company_id, name, stage, manager_only, status, created_by, created_at, updated_at, version, is_default, description
from survey_templates where survey_template_id = #{surveyTemplateId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
